title: Last Seen Leaving
description: When Miranda, a young drifter, vanishes after being picked up by a passing stranger following a car accident, no one realizes that she is missing for two months and are unaware that she is secretly living under an assumed name in a Virginia beach town or that her mysterious highway rescuer could be tied to dark rumors of a serial killer stalking young women. By the author of Josie and Jack.
author: Kelly Braffet
